S107O.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT GRAD?  1. SECOND LIEUTENANT 2. FIRST LIEUTENANT 3. CAPTAIN 4. MAJOR 5. WARRANT OFFICER

S107O.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 20 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 21 TO 24 YEARS 3. 25 TO 27 YEARS 4. 28 TO 29 YEARS 5. 30 TO 34 YEARS 6. 35 TO 37 YEARS 7. 38 TO 40 YEARS 8. 40 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

YES, MILITARY POLICE POOL ONLY (THIS INCLUDES M.P.R.T.C., PROVOST MARSHALL GENERAL REPLACEMENT POOL) 2. YES, MILITARY POLICE POOL AND SOME OTHERS 3. YES, OTHER POOLS (NOT MENTIONED ABOVE) 4. YES, NO ANSWER 5. NO, NEVER BEEN ASSIGNED TO AN OFFICER POOL 0. NO ANSWER E. TOTAL TIME AT ALL POOLS:

S107O.Q11. IF YOU WERE AN ENLISTED MAN, HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED, BEFORE PEARL HARBOR 2. I WAS DRAFTED, AFTER PEARL HARBOR 3. I VOLUNTEERED, BEFORE PEARL HARBOR 4. I VOLUNTEERED, AFTER PEARL HARBOR 5. I CAME IN THROUGH THE NATIONAL GUARD 6. I NEVER WAS AN ENLISTED MAN 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q16. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT UNIT (COMPANY, DETACHMENT, SEPARATE PLATOON)*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO ONE YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO TWO YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q17. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE CORPS OF MILITARY POLIC?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q18. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q19. HAS THE ARMY AT ANY TIME CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MA?  1. YES, I WAS CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 2. NO, I WAS NEVER CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS EVER CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q20. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE I?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED COMMAND 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 00. NO ANSWER

ARMORED COMMAND 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. UNDECIDED 00. NO ANSWER E. BRANCH LIKED NEXT TO THE LEAST:

ARMORED COMMAND 107. SIGNAL CORPS 3 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 11 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 41 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 9 13. MILITARY POLICE 36 14. UNDECIDED 184 00. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q22. WHAT IS YOUR MAIN ARMY JO?  1. COMPANY COMMANDER 2. PLATOON LEADER 3. SUPPLY OFFICER 4. S-3 (PLANS AND TRAINING) 5. ADJUTANT EXECUTIVE OR ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER 6. PROVOST MARSHALL 7. ALL OTHER 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q23. HOW LONG HAVE YOU HAD THIS JO?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q24A. HAVE YOU SPENT MOST OF YOUR WORKING TIME ON YOUR MAIN JOB OR DUTY DURING THE LAST FOUR WEEK?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 24B NOT CODED.
S107O.Q27. IS THERE ANY OTHER WORK IN THE CORPS OF MILITARY POLICE THAT YOU FEEL YOU WOULD RATHER BE DOING THAN YOUR PRESENT WOR?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q28. IS THERE ANY WORK IN SOME OTHER BRANCH OF SERVICE THAN THE MILITARY POLICE THAT YOU WOULD RATHER BE DOING THAN YOUR PRESENT WOR?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q29. HOW MUCH OF YOUR DUTY TIME IS USED IN DOING THINGS THAT DO NOT SEEM IMPORTANT TO YO?  1. A LOT OF IT 2. SOME OF IT 3. ONLY A LITTLE OF IT 4. NONE OF IT 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q30. DO YOU THINK THAT YOU ARE GIVEN ENOUGH AUTHORITY TO DO YOUR JOB PROPERL?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q31. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN THE WORK YOU ARE DOING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMEN?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q32. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMENT IF GIVEN A CHANC?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q33. IF YOU HAD A CHANCE TO CHOOSE, WOULD YOU RATHER BE A LINE OFFICER OR A STAFF OFFICE?  1. RATHER BE A STAFF OFFICER 2. RATHER BE A LINE OFFICER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q34. DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN PRESENT JOB OR DUTY IN THE ARMY AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q35. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW IMPORTANT IS THE JOB OF THE CORPS OF MILITARY POLICE IN WINNING THE WA?  1. IT HAS THE MOST IMPORTANT JOB 2. IT HAS ONE OF THE MORE IMPORTANT JOBS 3. IT HAS ONE OF THE LESS IMPORTANT JOBS 4. IT HAS THE LEAST IMPORTANT JOB 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q36. HOW MUCH WORK HAS THERE USUALLY BEEN TO DO ON YOUR JOB OR ASSIGNMENT DURING THE LAST FEW WEEK?  1. USUALLY MORE THAN ENOUGH TO DO 2. USUALLY ABOUT ENOUGH TO DO FOR A FULL DAY'S WORK 3. USUALLY LESS THAN ENOUGH TO DO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q37. DURING YOUR OFF-DUTY HOURS, HOW OFTEN DO YOU WORK ON IDEAS OR PLANS FOR IMPROVING YOUR OUTFI?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. FAIRLY OFTEN 3. ONCE IN A WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q38. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU GET YOUR FAIR SHARE OF OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q39. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT GIVES YOU A FAIR CHANCE OF PROMOTIO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q40. DO FUNCTIONAL DUTIES INTERFERE WITH THE TRAINING YOUR MEN ARE SUPPOSED TO BE GETTIN?  1. YES 2. NO 3. THEY ARE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE GETTING ANY TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q41. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, DO YOU THINK PROMOTIONS USUALLY GO TO THE OFFICERS WHO DESERVE THEM MOS?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. USUALLY NOT 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q42. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q43. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q44. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q45. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q46. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOUR CHANCES ARE OF BEING SENT OVERSEAS BEFORE THE END OF THE WA?  1. I'M ALMOST CERTAIN TO BE SENT 2. I'M FAIRLY CERTAIN TO BE SENT 3. THE CHANCES ARE ABOUT 50-50 I'LL BE SENT 4. I'M FAIRLY CERTAIN NOT TO BE SENT 5. I'M ALMOST CERTAIN NOT TO BE SENT 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q47. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY OR AS A CIVILIAN ENGAGED IN ESSENTIAL WAR WOR?  1. MORE AS A CIVILIAN ENGAGED IN ESSENTIAL WAR WORK 2. MORE AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY 3. NO DIFFERENCE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q48. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q49. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (DETACHMENT, UNIT)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q50. HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY (DETACHMENT, UNIT) WOULD YOU SAY ARE GOOD ALL-AROUND SOLDIER?  1. ALL ARE 2. MOST ARE 3. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 4. ONLY A FEW ARE 5. ALMOST NONE ARE 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q51. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 52 NOT CODED.

S107O.Q53. DO TOO MANY OF THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS SEEM USELESS TO YO?  1. YES, TOO MANY SEEM USELESS 2. NO, I USED TO THINK SO, BUT DON'T NOW 3. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT SO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q54. DOES YOUR UNIT HAVE SUFFICIENT OFFICERS TO PERFORM ADEQUATELY THE MISSION NOW ASSIGNE?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q55. DOES YOUR UNIT HAVE SUFFICIENT ENLISTED MEN TO PERFORM ADEQUATELY THE MISSION NOW ASSIGNE?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q56. HOW MUCH SUPERVISION IN THE CONDUCT OF YOUR JOB DO YOU RECEIVE FROM YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICER?  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q57. HAVE YOU RECEIVED ANY MILITARY POLICE TRAININ?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER I. QUESTIONS 58 TO 62 ARE TO BE ANSWERED ONLY BY THOSE MEN WHO HAVE RECEIVED MILITARY POLICE TRAINING. IF YOU HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY MILITARY POLICE TRAINING, SKIP THESE QUESTIONS AND CONTINUE WITH QUESTION 63.

S107O.Q58. WHERE DID YOU GET THIS TRAINING AND FOR HOW LON?  1. 1 MONTH OR LESS 2. OVER 1 MONTH UP TO 3 MONTHS 3. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 4. OVER 6 MONTHS 9. INAPPLICABLE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 59, 60 AND 61 NOT CODED.

S107O.Q62. IN YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT HOW MUCH ARE YOU USING THE MILITARY POLICE TRAINING YOU GO?  1. I USE THIS TRAINING ALL THE TIME 2. I USE THIS TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 3. I USE THIS TRAINING ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. I HARDLY EVER USE THIS TRAINING 5. I NEVER USE THIS TRAINING 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER I. ALL MEN WILL ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS:

S107O.Q63. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE RECEIVED OR ARE RECEIVING SUFFICIENT TRAINING FOR THE KINDS OF JOBS YOU HAVE TO D?  1. HAVE SUFFICIENT TRAINING 2. HAVE NEED FOR TRAINING IN SOME ASPECTS OF MY JOB 3. HAVE NEED FOR SOME TRAINING IN ALL ASPECTS OF MY JOB 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q64A. DO YOU THINK YOUR MEN SHOULD BE GETTING MORE OF ANY KIND OF TRAINING OR DRILL THAN THEY GET NO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 64B NOT CODED.

S107O.Q65A. DO YOU THINK THAT SOME OF THE ARMY TRAINING OR DRILL YOUR MEN ARE GETTING IS NOT NEEDED TO MAKE MEN GOOD SOLDIER?  1. YES, MUCH OF IT IS NOT NEEDED 2. YES, SOME OF IT IS NOT NEEDED 3. NO, ALL IS NEEDED 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 65B NOT CODED.

S107O.Q66. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW MUCH EMPHASIS DOES THE CURRENT TRAINING PROGRAM IN YOUR ARM OR SERVICE GIVE TO TRAINING ENLISTED MEN IN THE USE OF THEIR EQUIPMENT AND WEAPON?  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. MUCH TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q67A. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW MUCH USE IS MADE OF TRAINING FILMS IN YOUR PRESENT TRAINING PROGRA?  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. NOT QUITE ENOUGH 4. MUCH TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 67B NOT CODED.

S107O.Q69. HOW DO YOU THINK MOST OF THE NONCOMS WHO NOW SERVE WITH YOU COMPARE WITH THE AVERAGE RUN OF NONCOMS IN OTHER OUTFITS THAT YOU KNOW ABOU?  1. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE MUCH BETTER 2. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE SOMEWHAT BETTER 3. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE ABOUT AVERAGE 4. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE NOT QUITE AS GOOD 5. MOST OF MY NONCOMS ARE WORSE 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q70. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK IT IS FOR ENLISTED MEN TO FEEL THAT THEIR OFFICERS HAVE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR INDIVIDUAL WELFAR?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2

S107O.Q72. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK IT IS FOR ENLISTED MEN TO LIKE THE JOBS THEY ARE ASSIGNED T?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q73. DO YOU NOW HAVE MORE OR LESS RESPECT FOR THE MILITARY POLICE THAN WHEN YOU FIRST ENTERED THIS BRANCH OF SERVIC?  1. I NOW HAVE MORE RESPECT 2. I HAVE ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT OF RESPECT 3. I NOW HAVE LESS RESPECT 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q74. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE BY OFFICERS WITH LESS TRAINING AND ABILITY THAN YOU HAV?  1. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD BE DONE BY OFFICERS WITH LESS TRAINING AND ABILITY 2. MUCH OF IT COULD 3. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 4. NONE OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q75. SOME MEN THINK THERE IS NO NEED FOR A SEPARATE CORPS OF MILITARY POLICE. HOW WELL DO YOU THINK EACH BRANCH OF THE SERVICE COULD DO ITS OWN MILITARY POLICE WORK BY ITSEL?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q76. HOW DO YOU LIKE WEARING THE MILITARY POLICE BRASSAR?  1. IT MAKES ME FEEL PROUD 2. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 3. I DON'T LIKE TO WEAR IT 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q77. HOW MUCH DO YOU LIKE TO WEAR WHITE EQUIPMENT WHILE ON DUTY AS A MILITARY POLICEMA?  1. VERY MUCH 2. SOMEWHAT 3. NOT AT ALL 4. NEVER HAD ANY, NEVER ISSUED ANY, DON'T WEAR IT, ETC. 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q78. IN GENERAL, HOW SERIOUS AN OFFENSE DO YOU THINK IT IS FOR A SOLDIER TO GO AWO?  1. VERY SERIOUS 2. PRETTY SERIOUS 3. NOT SO SERIOUS 4. NOT SERIOUS AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. IT DEPENDS ON THE CONDITIONS 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q79A. DO YOU THINK THAT SOLDIERS IN OTHER BRANCHES OF SERVICE HAVE ANY IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRU?  1. SOLDIERS IN OTHER BRANCHES HAVE MANY IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRUE 2. SOLDIERS IN OTHER BRANCHES HAVE SOME IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRUE 3. SOLDIERS IN OTHER BRANCHES HAVE NO IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRUE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 79B NOT CODED.

S107O.Q80. DO YOU THINK THAT THE GENERAL PUBLIC HAS ANY IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRU?  1. THE PUBLIC HAS MANY IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRUE 2. THE PUBLIC HAS SOME IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRUE 3. THE PUBLIC HAS NO IDEAS ABOUT THE MILITARY POLICE THAT ARE NOT TRUE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 81 NOT CODED.

S107O.Q82. WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES DO YOU THINK GETS THE LEAST AMOUNT OF CREDIT FROM THE GENERAL PUBLI?  1. FIELD ARTILLERY 2. INFANTRY 3. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 4. MILITARY POLICE 5. AIR CORPS 6. ARMORED COMMAND (TANKS) 7. ENGINEERS 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q83. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW "TOUGH" ARE MOST MILITARY POLICEMEN IN THEIR TREATMENT OF SOLDIER?  1. VERY TOUGH 2. SOMEWHAT TOUGH 3. NOT TOUGH AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S107O.Q84. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK MILITARY POLICEMEN SHOULD BE MORE OR LESS "TOUGH" IN THEIR TREATMENT OF SOLDIER?  1. MORE TOUGH 2. THE SAME AS THEY NOW ARE 3. LESS TOUGH 0. NO ANSWER

S107O.Q85. ARE CONDITIONS AND OPPORTUNITIES FOR SPORTS AND ATHLETICS SATISFACTORY IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. VERY SATISFACTORY 2. SATISFACTORY 3. UNSATISFACTORY 4. VERY UNSATISFACTORY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
